trans-unit.source: The ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement class represents a configuration element for an <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Klasa ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement reprezentuje element konfiguracji dla <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> can be configured for server applications using standard configuration files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>Można skonfigurować dla aplikacji serwerowych za pomocą plików konfiguracji standardowej.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref> class.

When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement>, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Gdy ten konstruktor służy do inicjowania nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>klasy <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A>właściwość jest ustawiona na <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement>, <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A>właściwość jest ustawiona na <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>i <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection>właściwość jest ustawiona na `null`.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance should be set to appropriate values for the application before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Właściwości na <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>wystąpienie klasy powinien być ustawiony na odpowiednie wartości aplikacji przed wywołaniem <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A>metody.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>

trans-unit.source: The BuildPolicy method builds a new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> instance based on the properties set on the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy nową metodę BuildPolicy <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> na właściwości ustawione na podstawie wystąpienia <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"> </xref> klasy.

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance must be set before calling the BuildPolicy method.
trans-unit.target: Właściwości na <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>wystąpienie klasy musi być ustawiona przed wywołaniem metody BuildPolicy.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> instance that represents the extended protection policy created.
trans-unit.target: Nowy <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> wystąpienie reprezentującego utworzenie zasad ochrony rozszerzonej.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list used to match against a client's SPN for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia niestandardowego dostawcy nazwy usługi (SPN) lista używana do dopasowywania klienta SPN dla tego elementu zasad konfiguracji.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref> that includes the custom SPN list used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"> </xref> zawierającej niestandardowe listy nazw SPN używany do dopasowywania SPN klienta.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the policy enforcement value for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia wartość wymuszania zasad dla tego elementu zasad konfiguracji.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"> </xref> wartość, która wskazuje, kiedy należy wymusić zasady ochrony rozszerzonej.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the kind of protection enforced by the extended protection policy for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia typ ochrony wymuszane przez te zasady ochrony rozszerzonej dla tego elementu zasad konfiguracji.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"></xref> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"> </xref> wartość, która wskazuje rodzaj ochrony wymuszany przez zasady.
